basic_information.scholarship_name: Jill Kelsey Scholarship in Strategic Communications

description: This scholarship recognizes a Strategic Communications student who shows passion and commitment to their chosen major as evidenced by strong academic performance. Eligibility Requirements Must have a declared degree in Strategic Communications Minimum cumulative 3.3 GPA Minimum of 60 hours of coursework completed
